heading: Tuesday Night
text: Clearing south, and variable clouds north, except clouds increasing in the St. Lawrence Valley, with the chance of a snow shower there. Lows from zero to 10 above, with cold hollows around 5 below. South to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph, becoming light and variable east of the Greens.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. A rising chance of snow showers from the northern Greens westward, otherwise chance late, except slight chance southeast. Highs in the low to mid 20s. South to southwest winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, with a trace to 2 inches. Lows from the upper teens to mid 20s, some mid teens northeast. South winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.
